title: Web Maintenance Specialist
description: Responsible for maintaining the website, ensuring all pages are functional, updating product listings, and optimizing the site for SEO and user experience.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and CMS platforms (e.g., WordPress, Shopify)
Experience with website optimization and debugging
Knowledge of SEO best practices

title: Store Manager
description: Oversee daily operations at Gadget Heaven's retail store, manage staff, maintain inventory, and ensure excellent customer service.
requirements: Proven experience in retail management
Strong leadership and organizational skills
Ability to analyze sales data and suggest improvements
Excellent communication skills

title: Delivery Driver
description: Deliver gadgets and accessories to customers promptly while ensuring excellent service and product safety.
requirements: Valid UAE driving license
Good knowledge of local routes
Ability to lift and carry packages up to 15kg
Customer service skills

title: Warehouse Assistant
description: Assist in managing inventory, packing orders, and coordinating deliveries from the warehouse to the store or customers.
requirements: High school diploma or equivalent
Experience in inventory management or logistics
Attention to detail and time management skills
Basic computer knowledge

title: E-Commerce Specialist
description: Manage the online store, optimize product pages for conversions, monitor sales, and execute marketing campaigns to drive online growth.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or related field
Experience with e-commerce platforms (e.g., Shopify, Magento)
Knowledge of digital marketing and analytics tools
Strong communication and teamwork skills
